name: The Merdividual
description:
Only tested in Chrome / macOS Mojave / Windows 10. Try other platforms at your own risk.

WASD or arrow keys to move. Press space on the title screen + dialog screens to continue, and to drop your current hat.

Made for the Bristol Pride Game Jam 2019 based on the following prompts:

  • Agender
  • Mermaid
  • "These battle lines are hidden behind..…"
  • Peppermint

CREDITS
